name: The Devotees - Vertdegris Variant
description:
Five deities surrounded by a myriad of their devotees.
Those are adaptive gods, with flexible meanings, subjected to your own experiences, beliefs and thoughts.
They could be representations of either pagans or classical monotheistic myths. They could be symbols of abstract concepts, or a mere, waxy looking, bas-relief.
Here is my own take on it, from top left to bottom right:
The Everflowing Deity of creativity and arts 
The Thick Goddess of unbridled pleasure and non-canonical beauty 
The Uncomfortable God of boomers and inertia 
The Motherly Deity of unconditional love and cuddles
The Brutalist God of wholesome masculinity
